import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Navbar, NavbarBrand, Nav, NavItem, NavLink, Button, Modal, Form, ModalHeader, FormGroup, Label, Input } from 'reactstrap'; import { NavLink as RRNavLink} from 'react-router-dom'; import Logo from '../../assets/logo.png'; import UserIcon from '../../assets/user.svg'; import axiosWithAuth from '../Login/withAuth'; import jwt from 'jsonwebtoken'; import { dbUrl } from '../../actions/index'; import Sidebar from './EmployeeSidebar'; import Footer from '../Other/Footer'; import '../../styles/employee-navbar.scss'; const EmployeeNavbar = () => { return (
Tasks Work Orders Customers Files Employees
USER
) } export default EmployeeNavbar;
